casebody.data:
Anthony D. JONES, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
GUS HARRISON CORRECTIONAL FACILITY WARDEN, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158148
COA: 342620 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 4, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion to supplement is GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the July 19, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court. The motions for immediate discharge are DENIED.
